event.eventText: Jamie and Rachel invent a time machine as a wedding gift to Sean.
During a team meeting, a loud and suspiciously smelly noise erupts from Sean's location. No one mentions it though.
Rachel helps Sean out with a particularly tedious issue.... should he make a toast to the bridesmaids in his speech or is that the best mans job?
Congratulations!! The most amazing day of your life. You marry your childhood sweetheart in front of hundreds of tearful onlookers (who the heck invited all of them...Abu...Facebook?)
Still exhausted from married life you accidently say something you shouldn't to HR team.
Visit Graz with her new baby. Apparently she has given it the middle name SEan in the hope it may turn out as helpful as you.
You get so fed up with one of the testers you shut them in a cupboard over the weekend and play loud rock music so their screams cannot be heard.
Stuart comes to visit you as he misses your bro-mance so badly. He is wearing a dress and you find that a bit awkward....
During his summer break, Sean develops a rash on his forearm, possibly related to the new device Tosin has been developing.
During an xbox session with Jamie, Sean confesses his secret crush on a former senior management work colleague.
Lyndsay and Sean are delighted to announce the safe delivery of their quads, 6 weeks early but all healthy and well.
Sean takes up a new hobby - flower arranging. Using his new skills he makes a bouquet for Abu's wife when she safely delivers twins.
Sean goes to Daryl's retirement party and shows off his new moves on the dance floor.
